input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Acrimet Wall-mounted Modular File Holder (2 - Pack) (Smoke Color)

Item keywords:
Modern Modular Design Easy to expand to fit your needs
Modern, strong and sturdy construction
Includes Wall Hangers
Makes Organizing Easy
Set with 2
input_text.Response A: The Acrimet Wall-Modular Filer Holder is easy to use and expand to fit your needs. Comes with wall hanger. Modern and sleek design in “smoke” color is perfect for files, folders, magazines, papers and more. This space saving organizational tool makes this item ideal for homes, offices, schools, hospitals and more.  Set of 2 included with your purchase.
input_text.Response B: Samsung uses the latest Lithium Ion battery technology giving you the best performance possible. This Lithium Ion battery is designed specifically for your Samsung Galaxy S3 mobile phone to deliver the most reliable and long lasting power (2100 mAh). The Galaxy S III 2100 mAh battery is also NFC-enabled, letting your phone communicate with other devices and accessories equipped with NFC technology.

label_annotations.factors_a: My score is based on the parameters provided is the study.
label_annotations.factors_b: My score is based on the parameters provided is the study. AlsoB failed to meet most of the parameters provided.
